p.k: Alexa takes on the role of submissive to Franck Franco's dominant. There is a clever mix of the sinister with the sweet, the ominous with the innocent, the rough with the tender. After a dark and disquieting introduction (enhanced by a foreboding soundtrack) we're given several different views of Alexa and Franck's relationship. They're in love, they're impulsive and spontaneous, and after Alexa makes a not so subtle suggestion, they're obviously open to experimentation and erotic adventure
